meanings.definition: A person who follows the philosophical theory of existentialism.
meanings.sent1: Many existentialists believe in the importance of individual freedom and choice.
meanings.sent2: The existentialists gathered to discuss the meaning of life.
meanings.sent3: The existentialists joked about the absurdity of existence over coffee.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of uncertainty, existentialists are the lighthouses guiding lost souls.
meanings.sent5: The existentialists' search for meaning echoed through the halls of academia.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to existentialism or existentialists.
meanings.sent1: She wrote an existentialist essay exploring the themes of freedom and responsibility.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a section dedicated to existentialist literature.
meanings.sent3: His existentialist fashion sense raised eyebrows at the party.
meanings.sent4: The city streets took on an existentialist vibe under the dim streetlights.
meanings.sent5: The existentialist perspective added depth to her artistic creations.
